projects.name: Book Store - E-commerce store
projects.description: Single page Application Ecommerce store where users can buy and sell books.
bullets: - Users can login with their Google Account or create an account with username, email, password.
- Users have access to a dashboard that contains their profile, store, orders.
- Users can Search for books by their favorite genre, language, author.
- Users can add books to their cart increase or decreate quantity.
- Payment is done with stripe gateway.
- Front-end, Back-end, Database each runs in its dedicated docker container.
- Application containers managed using kubernetes.

projects.name: ft_transcendence - Team Project
projects.description: ft_transcendence is a single page Application where users can chat and play a real time multiplayer online game
bullets: - Users can secure their account with two factor authentication.
- Users can send and receive friend requests.
- Users can play an online Ping-pong game.
- You can search for users by their name, send friend request or block them.
- You can play an online Ping-pong game, search for opponents or challenge your friends.
- You can chat with your friends, create (public, private, protected) channels where you can assign admin roles, block, mute members and add freinds to the channel.

projects.name: ft_services - System Administration and Networking Project
projects.description: ft_services is an introduction to kubernetes, discovering cluster managment, deployment, networking and clustering visualization
bullets: - Creating an infrastructure of different services
- Setting up a multi-services cluster, each service run in a dedicated container
- The Services are Nginx, WordPress, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin, FTPS, Grafana, InfluxDB
- Services configured With LivnessProbe for containers health check, PersistentVolumeClaim for data persistence
- Load Balancing is done with metalLB

projects.name: Tasks Lists
projects.description: Tasks Lists is a small single page Application built with react-js and css where users can create customizable lists of tasks
bullets: - User have access to an interface where he can create a List of Tasks and customize its colors
- User can track his tasks and mark them as complete

projects.name: XO - 3D Three.js Online Runtime Game
projects.description: XO is a Three.js MERN stack Socket.io online runtime game, bundled with chat and live streaming .
bullets: - Users can play the famous Tic-tac-toe game with more features, they have access to an ingame chat .
- Users can also watch a live streaming of Games being played .
- Users have access to a Toke based authentication system where they can create their account.

projects.name: Gundam - 3D Three.js Interface
projects.description: Gundam Project is a Three.js 3D interface with a customizable 3D Model .
bullets: - Users have access to a 3D Work interface and a 3D customizable Gundam Sazabi model .
- Users can customize all parts, colour, and shadow boldness of their Gundam Sazabi model
